text: C/2019 Y1 (ATLAS) is a comet with a near-parabolic orbit discovered by the ATLAS survey on 16 December 2019. It passed perihelion on March 15, 2020 at 0.84 AU from the sun. == Observations == The comet passes close to Earth in early May 2020. It is visible in the northern hemisphere sky in the spring of 2020. 480px :1 week motion across the sky == References == == External links== * TheSkyLive Comet C/2019 Y1 (ATLAS) * astro.vanbuitenen.nl 2019Y1 * Universe Today March 25, 2020 by David Dickinson C2019Y4 20191216 Category:Comets in 2020
title: C/2019 Y1 (ATLAS)
